articles.title: 'No option left other than full blown war', says Pakistan's Khawaja Asif amid escalating tensions with India - Firstpost
articles.description: Pakistan Defence Minister Khawaja Asif on Friday said that Islamabad has “no option left other than full a blown war” in response to what he described as India’s increasingly aggressive posture over the past four days
